content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hi Farhad, nice to meet you. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Okay, Mister Schmidt, I'm ready to hear your offer for the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I think 1000 Euro per month would be a fair price for my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's an interesting starting point, Mister Schmidt. I'll consider it. Can you tell me if there's any room for negotiation on that price?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I always leave room for negotiation. It's part of the game. So, let's hear your counter-offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, I appreciate that. I was thinking around the 850 Euro mark. What do you think?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: That's too low for me, Farhad. I'll meet you halfway. How about 925 Euro? It's a good deal considering the prime location of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I respect your offer, but I'm looking to keep the rent closer to 875 Euro. It would be more in line with the other options I'm considering.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I see, Farhad. I can't go that low, but I can meet you in the middle at 900 Euro. It's a great apartment, and I'm sure you'll appreciate the convenience of its location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, you've been very generous with your offer. I'm tempted to accept, but I'm going to hold out a bit longer. How about 885 Euro? It's a fair compromise, I think.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Farhad, I'm trying to be reasonable here. 885 Euro is too low for me. I can do 895 Euro, but that's as low as I can go.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
